knimeNode.name: Keyword Density
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node analyzes text content retrieved from URL and calculates keyword density data.

fullDescription.intro: This node leverage Jsoup to parse HTML content and Lucene to tokenize terms and generate a list of term frequency. You can also use the Exclude field to filter out certain keywords that should not be part of the report.
fullDescription.option: A selection of String columns from the input table, the chosen column will be used in URL(s) submission.
A comma separated list of terms to be excluded from final results

ports.inPort: An input table that contains a URL column

outPort.name: Table output of keyword density result

ports.outPort: An output table keyword density results in percentages and actual frequencies
